quality.reason: Rooms are beautifully designed with modern decor and thoughtful amenities, but are small and have occasional maintenance issues.

location.reason: Situated in Center City Philadelphia, the hotel is close to major attractions and offers excellent convenience.

service.reason: Staff are friendly and professional, though there are occasional issues with check-in and communication.

safety.reason: Guests feel safe due to solid safety measures and the central, busy location.
